line_1: And shuffle ourselves and our chairs a bit nigher;
line_2: With shrugs and with shivers all look at the fire,

line_1: Tells t'other, He can come no nigher.
line_2: Says Mars, thro' Cannons Mouths in Fire;

line_1: And draws the wand'ring beauty nigher,
line_2: Now winter lights its chearful fire,
